articles.title: 36 Practical Products Under $25 That'll Improve Your Life This Spring
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products. Olay launched a Super Serum Body Wash, Neutrogena released an Ultra Sheer Moisturizing Face SPF 60 Serum, L'Oreal introduced an illuminating moisturizer, and Medicube launched "Zero Pore" Pads. Additionally, Londontown released "Nail Veil" Protectant, Monday Haircare launched Dry Shampoo, Revlon introduced a volcanic stone face roller, Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum, and EOS has released Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion.

articles.title: The End of Paid Influence: How Christine Ryss's Orcool is Rebuilding Trust in Advertising With Real Customer Voices
articles.author: Hazel Saunders
articles.summary: Orcool, led by Christine Ryss, is launching FanFlywheel, an AI-powered platform. FanFlywheel transforms customer reviews into high-performing video ads for platforms like TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels, automating ad creation and performance prediction.

articles.title: Schmicko® Brings Expert Car Care to Doorsteps Across Sydney, NSW
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Schmicko Sydney, a premium mobile car care provider, is rolling out its services across Greater Sydney. This expansion brings their auto detailing services, including mobile car washes and ceramic coating, to a broader customer base.

articles.title: 28 Reliable Products You'll Want To Own In Your 30s
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched its new "Sqeezy" set, taking their legendary cleaning paste to new heights with the help of a versatile cleaning sponge. This product is designed to tackle stubborn grease and mildew, with reviewers praising its effectiveness.

articles.title: Video apps like Hulu "cannot be used on Nintendo Switch 2," says support page
articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching Switch 2 with backward compatibility. Nintendo has tested over 15,000 third-party Switch games with the new console to ensure compatibility. Nintendo updated its compatibility support page with the results of nearly two months of extra testing for the launch of Switch 2.

articles.title: Nintendo updates mobile app ahead of Switch 2 launch, adding GameChat and screenshot upload
articles.author: Ed Nightingale
articles.summary: Nintendo updated its mobile app. This update signals changes or improvements to Nintendo's existing mobile service.

articles.title: DB Cosmetics Review: High End Skincare Dupes For Under $30
articles.author: Brittany Stewart
articles.summary: Designer Brands (DB) Cosmetics has launched a new skincare collection consisting of a Revitalising Cleanser, Plumping Serum, Brightening Serum, and Nourishing Moisturiser, with prices under $29. The Australian-made range is inspired by Trinny London skincare, offering a more affordable alternative with similar ingredients and results. DB Cosmetics also offers affordable alternatives to other popular cosmetic products such as NARS Light Reflecting Foundation, Lancome Absolute Perfecting Primer, Dior Lip Oil, Fenty and Rhode bestsellers.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney is selling her used bathwater — Here's how fans are reacting
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, has launched a limited-edition bar of soap called Bathwater Bliss. The soap contains water from Sweeney's promotional bath shoot and is formulated with exfoliating sand and pine bark extract, featuring a Douglas fir and moss scent. Only 5,000 bars are available for purchase exclusively through Dr. Squatch's website.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's ‘Bathwater' Soap Has Created a Mess in Her Instagram Comments
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch has launched a limited-edition bar of soap incorporating Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. This product, developed in response to fan requests, contains exfoliating sand, pine bark extract, and Sweeney's bathwater, with a scent profile of pine, Douglas fir, and earthy moss. The marketing campaign capitalizes on Sweeney's role as the Dr. Squatch Body Wash Genie.

articles.title: How cheap communist car maker became one of Britain's best-selling budget brands
articles.author: Freda Lewis-Stempel
articles.summary: Dacia launched the Logan saloon in 2004 for €5,000, revolutionizing the automotive market. The Sandero and Duster models followed by 2010, expanding Dacia's budget-friendly car options. The Dacia Sandero was introduced to UK roads in 2013 for £5,995.

articles.title: N64 App on Switch Online to Get Switch 2 Exclusive Features
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Nintendo will add exclusive features to the Nintendo 64 app for Nintendo Switch Online on the Nintendo Switch 2. These features include Rewind, CRT Screen Filter and View/Change Controls. View/Change Controls will also be available on the Switch 1.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Launches October 16 for Switch 2 and Switch 1
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company and Game Freak will launch Pokémon Legends: Z-A for Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch on October 16. Digital pre-orders start on June 5. The Nintendo Switch 2 edition features improved graphics and frame rates.

articles.title: motorola razr 60 colors and features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the motorola razr. Motorola is known for mobile innovation.

articles.title: Motorola razr 60 price in India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola officially launched the motorola razr. Motorola is known for mobile innovation.

articles.title: Motorola flip phone 2025 launch
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the motorola razr.

articles.title: Steam Deck Gets A Major Boost With A Native GeForce Now App
articles.author: Alex Newhouse
articles.summary: Nvidia launched a native GeForce Now app for Steam Deck, enabling users to stream games using Nvidia's cloud hardware. The GeForce Now app allows Steam Deck players to leverage more powerful hardware and advanced features, including playing games at up to 4K/60FPS when connected to a TV.

articles.title: Access to This All-in-One AI Tool Is Only $60
articles.author: Stack Commerce Team
articles.summary: AI Magicx, a new AI-powered content creation suite, offers tools for generating text, logos, images, and chatbots. A subscription to AI Magicx includes the Rune Plan, providing a monthly allowance of images, logos, unlimited word generation, and chatbot messages, along with a commercial license.

articles.title: How Two Entrepreneurs Made $200 Million By Selling Mayonnaise For $10 Per Jar
articles.author: Eric McConnell
articles.summary: In 2015, Primal Kitchen introduced its avocado-based mayonnaise to the market, targeting the health-conscious and paleo-diet communities with a price point of $9.95 per jar. The product quickly gained popularity, selling 12,000 units in the first week and expanding to high-end grocery stores nationwide within a year.

articles.title: Skoda Favorit: Communist-era hatch reimagined as an affordable EV
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Skoda debuted the Favorit back in 1987. Now Skoda has unveiled the Favorit as an EV concept.

articles.title: Skoda Favorit: Communist-era hatch reimagined as an affordable EV
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Skoda is reimagining its Favorit model from 1987 as an electric vehicle (EV) concept. This hints at a possible launch of a new EV product line inspired by the classic design.

articles.title: Skoda Favorit: Communist-era hatch reimagined as an affordable EV
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Skoda Favorit, originally debuted in 1987, is now being reimagined as an EV concept. This represents a new product development for the company.

articles.title: Your iPhone Is About to Get One of the Pixel's Coolest Features
articles.author: Tucker Bowe
articles.summary: Google has launched new AI-powered photo editing features within Google Photos for Android and iPhone users, expanding availability beyond Pixel smartphone users. The update includes AI-powered suggestions and tools for quick edits.

articles.title: Having this gaming subscription feels like a secret weapon, and now it's available on Steam OS
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched its GeForce Now cloud gaming service on Steam Deck. This allows Steam Deck users to stream over 2,000 games at 4K 60FPS from platforms like Steam and Epic Games. GeForce Now offers three plans: Free, Performance, and Ultimate, with the Ultimate plan providing an RTX 4080-equipped virtual PC for $20 per month, enabling high-performance cloud gaming.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney promotes her own bathwater in new soap collab. The internet has thoughts.
articles.author: Melina Khan
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney and Dr. Squatch have collaborated to launch a new soap, "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss," which is promoted using Sweeney's bathwater.  A limited run of 5,000 bars will be available, with 100 given away and the remainder sold for $8 each starting June 6.

articles.title: Video apps like Hulu 'cannot be used on Nintendo Switch 2,' says support page
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 will have a limited number of new releases initially. Players can use their existing library of Switch games on the new console during the first few months after launch. This strategy provides immediate value and content for early adopters of the Switch 2.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Is Selling Her Used Bathwater as Soap
articles.author: Clare Donaldson
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney launched 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss,' a limited edition men's soap line in partnership with Dr. Squatch. The soap contains a drop of Sweeney's bathwater and is made from pine bark extract and sand. Only 5,000 bars are available.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Sells Bathwater To Fans, People React
articles.author: Morgan Murrell
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch has introduced a limited edition natural soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss," made from Sydney's bathwater. This product launch is a result of the high demand generated by a Dr. Squatch body wash commercial featuring Sydney Sweeney. The soap will be available for purchase on June 6 at drsquatch.com.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends release date announced: Pre-order merchandise and more details we know so far
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company International is launching the new video game "Pokemon Legends: Z-A" in October, available for Nintendo Switch and a potential upgrade to Nintendo Switch 2.  Pokemon Centre is also launching new merchandise to promote Mega Evolution, tied to the upcoming game, including pins and apparel.

articles.title: Disguised New Tesla Model at Fremont Looks Like Compact Model Y
articles.author: Brian Wang
articles.summary: Tesla is anticipated to unveil a new, lower-priced model by the end of June 2025. A disguised prototype of this new Tesla model was observed at the Tesla Fremont factory, featuring covered front and rear sections.

articles.title: Gen Z Wants Utility From AI—Not Gimmicks
articles.author: Garrick Schmitt
articles.summary: Brands like Ikea, Sephora, and Duolingo are integrating AI to enhance customer experiences, such as virtually redesigning living rooms (Ikea), matching skin tones to foundation (Sephora), and providing language tutoring (Duolingo). These AI applications improve user experience by adding value in the mentioned application areas, creating a shorter path to useful outcomes.

articles.title: Star Trek Fans Were Already In For An Exciting Summer, But It Just Got Even Better Because Discovery's Shazad Latif Is Leading A New Sci-Fi Series
articles.author: Mick Joest
articles.summary: AMC is launching Nautilus, a new sci-fi series starring Shazad Latif, on June 29th. Paramount+ will release Star Trek: Strange New Worlds Season 3 on July 17th. The series will explore adventures under the sea and in space.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch Phone App Just Got A Lot Better
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 in one week. Prior to the launch, Nintendo updated the Nintendo Switch Online app.

articles.title: X-Design Rolls Out New AI Background Generator To Streamline E-commerce Photography Workflow
articles.author: X-Design
articles.summary: X-Design launched the AI Background Generator, a new tool designed to help e-commerce businesses upscale their product photography. The tool aims to modernize the creation of professional-quality product images, boosting sales for e-commerce stores.

articles.title: X-Design Rolls Out New AI Background Generator To Streamline E-commerce Photography Workflow
articles.author: X-Design
articles.summary: X-Design introduced the AI Background Generator, a new AI-powered tool designed for e-commerce businesses. This product aims to improve product photography, leading to cost and time savings.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney launches bizarre soap made from her own ‘bathwater'
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, is launching a limited-edition soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss" made with Sydney Sweeney's actual bathwater. The soap will be available for sale from June 6, 2025, on drsquatch.com.

articles.title: This $10 Bottle-Emptying Kit Is So Good, Reviewers Wonder How They Ever Lived Without It
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Flip-it! is a 'Shark Tank'-approved adapter and dispenser system designed to stand bottles upside down, ensuring complete product usage. The kit includes a base cap and multiple size adapters, fitting most screw-top plastic products. Reviewers praise Flip-it! for its ease of use, cost-effectiveness, and ability to extend the life of lotions, soaps, and other household products.

articles.title: Don't like the current BMW designs? Worry not, they're all changing soon
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: BMW plans to implement a new design language across its entire line-up, inspired by the Neue Klasse Concept, remodeling both electric and ICE vehicles. This overhaul includes a significant facelift for the 5-Series and redesigns for models ranging from the 2 Series to the X5 and 7 Series, and also the upcoming iX3 electric model.

articles.title: Realme launches GT 7 Series with 7000mAh battery
articles.author: Gk News Service
articles.summary: Realme has launched its GT 7 Series smartphones in India, including the GT 7, GT 7 Dream Edition, and GT 7T, targeting the premium segment. The GT 7 features a MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset and a 7000mAh battery, while the Dream Edition boasts an Aston Martin Racing Green finish. Realme also introduced the Buds Air 7 Pro earbuds with AI live translation and 48-hour battery life.

articles.title: Anybody who gets the Switch 2 early won't be able to play it – here's why
articles.author: Dan Grabham
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Switch 2, featuring a mandatory Day 1 patch to prevent pre-launch gameplay leaks. Hands-on impressions suggest the Switch 2 is a premium upgrade with features like built-in mouse controls, a 1080p, 120Hz, HDR screen, and hardware capable of running current-gen games.

articles.title: Glow from Head to Toe: The Power of Body Scrubs in Skincare
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Dove launched Exfoliating Body Polish Scrub with Brown Sugar & Coconut Butter which combines natural exfoliants like brown sugar with deeply nourishing coconut butter and Dove's signature ¼ moisturizing cream. Bath & Body Works introduced Water Lily Springs Creamy Body Scrub which offers a delicate balance of exfoliation and moisture with a beautifully floral twist. Be Bodywise released 10% AHA Body Scrub with Oat & Aloe Vera Extract is a targeted solution for those struggling with body acne, uneven skin tone, strawberry legs, or keratosis pilaris and Victoria's Secret launched Pink Lavender Soothing Body Scrub with Vitamin E.

articles.title: Baadigi Launches Data-Driven Marketing Service to Support Small Business Growth
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Baadigi, LLC, launched its new Data-as-a-Service (DaaS) platform aimed at equipping small and medium-sized businesses with data-driven marketing capabilities. The DaaS platform enables businesses to extract and apply proprietary data insights directly into their marketing workflows, driving efficiency and performance. Businesses using Baadigi's solutions have seen an average 20% increase in marketing ROI and a 35% improvement in lead generation within the first three months of implementation.

articles.title: Moonkie Unveils Hug & Go Toddler Backpack Ahead of International Children's Day
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: Moonkie, a baby and toddler brand, has launched the Moonkie Hug & Go™ Toddler Backpack. This backpack features a child-sized design with a removable plush companion, aiming to encourage independence and provide emotional reassurance for toddlers. The product is inspired by Montessori principles and designed to support growth and development.

articles.title: Origin Coolmax Pillow review: super cool, but there's a catch
articles.author: Reviews Manager
articles.summary: Origin launched the Coolmax Latex Pillow, priced at £98, emphasizing its cooling properties and supportive design. The pillow is made with latex infused with a cooling gel and is designed to be breathable.  It is compared to competitors like Simba and Emma pillows, with the reviewer noting that while it offers cooling benefits and support, it may be too firm for some and isn't as much of a bargain as Origin claims.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends release date announced: Pre-order merchandise and more details we know so far
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company International is launching the video game 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A' in October, available for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2, with preorders starting June 5.  The company is also launching new Mega Evolution merchandise at Pokemon Centre and offering a free Sitting Cuties plush with preorders of 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A' at Pokemon Centre in the US, Canada, and the UK.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review: Elegance meets raw power
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge features a Galaxy AI-powered Browser Assist. The device also showcases camera samples in ultra-wide-angle, normal 1X view, 2X zoom, 4X zoom, 10X zoom, and portrait mode, implying a new product launch or a preview of its features.

articles.title: 'Soft and comfy' dress costs £32 but looks like £1,700 designer garment
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has launched the Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress with Linen, priced at £32, featuring an 'Italy-inspired' print. The dress is made from a lightweight linen blend, available in sizes 6-22 (regular), 4-18 (petite) and 10-20 (tall), and has received positive customer reviews for its comfort and design.

articles.title: 'Smart and cool' holiday dress from Next looks like £1,700 designer item
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has launched a Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress with Linen, priced at £32. The dress features an 'Italy-inspired' pink and blue house print pattern and is made from a lightweight linen blend. It's available in regular, petite, and tall fits, with sizes ranging from 4 to 22.

articles.title: This mini chainsaw is the 'greatest little tool' — and it's only $60 ahead of Father's Day
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Seesii is promoting its six-inch mini chainsaw as a versatile tool suitable for gardening, camping, landscaping, and preparing firewood. The chainsaw features a 900W motor, a 21V 4.0Ah lithium battery, and has received positive reviews on Amazon for its lightweight build and easy-to-use design.

articles.title: Home Bargains £2.99 cream looks 'just like' £48 Sol de Janeiro version
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains introduced a new "glow cream" product priced at £2.49 for 250ml, drawing inspiration from Sol de Janeiro's Bum Bum cream, which sells for £48 for a 240ml tub. The Home Bargains cream is described as having a vanilla, almond, and salted caramel scent similar to the Sol de Janeiro product, though some users note differences in texture and scent strength.

articles.title: New India Assurance Co. Ltd., Oman Honored with Times of Oman Best Brand in Customer Experience Award
articles.author: Times News Service
articles.summary: New India Assurance, Oman, received the Times of Oman Best Brand in Customer Experience Award. The company launched a Customer Care Centre in December 2024, offering direct call lines and WhatsApp support to enhance customer accessibility.

articles.title: Dunkin' summer menu includes new Paige DeSorbo approved pink drink. Here's what's in it
articles.author: Catherine Messier
articles.summary: Dunkin' has launched two new summer-themed items: the Orange N' Vanilla Specialty Donut and the Pink Spritz Refresher. The donut features a glazed cake with vanilla icing, while the refresher is a fizzy blend of guava, orange, and passion fruit flavors. Dunkin' collaborated with Paige DeSorbo to promote the Pink Spritz Refresher, which is available for a limited time at $3 for a medium.

articles.title: Dunkin' just released their summer menu, including a new refresher. Here's the full lineup
articles.author: Catherine Messier
articles.summary: Dunkin' has launched its summer menu, introducing the Orange N' Vanilla Specialty Donut and the Dunkin' Pink Spritz Refresher, a fizzy blend of guava, orange, and passion fruit flavors. The Pink Spritz Refresher is available for a limited time, with Dunkin' collaborating with Paige DeSorbo for its introduction.

articles.title: The Linux 6.15 kernel arrives - and it's big a victory for Rust fans
articles.author: Steven Vaughan-Nichols
articles.summary: Linux kernel 6.15 has been released, featuring a Rust-based driver named NOVA for Nvidia's RTX 2000 series and newer GPUs. This driver aims to replace the existing open-source Nouveau Nvidia drivers, marking a move towards open-source collaboration between Linux and Nvidia.

articles.title: Why I prefer this portable SSD for work travel over my Samsung and Sandisk
articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.summary: Crucial's X10 portable SSD is available in multiple storage sizes. The SSD has an IP65 durability rating. The Crucial X10 is well-equipped to weather the elements.

articles.title: Our favorite budget video doorbell gets an upgrade - see what's new with Amazon's Blink
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the second-generation Blink Video Doorbell, succeeding the first model after four years. Available now for $70, the new doorbell features a 150-degree field of view, an upgrade from the previous 135-degree model. This release coincides with the new Blink Sync Module Core.

articles.title: New PDI Experience Designer Helps Convenience Retailers Increase Customer Engagement and Loyalty
articles.author: PDI Technologies
articles.summary: PDI Technologies introduced PDI Experience Designer, a tool that enables convenience retailers like Weigel's to personalize loyalty programs. Weigel's is leveraging PDI Experience Designer to create targeted campaigns that influence purchasing behaviors and improve customer engagement. The aim of using PDI Experience designer is to increase business profitability through personalized loyalty journeys.

articles.title: GM invests $1.4 billion in new V8 following mass recall
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: GM will introduce a new V8 engine. The V8 engine is set to replace the current engine in the Silverado and GMC Yukon Denali.

articles.title: New Gelato Shop Opens On Long Island
articles.author: Jade Eckardt
articles.summary: Dolce Scoop Gelato, a new gelato shop on Long Island, is celebrating its grand opening. The shop offers traditional gelato made with Italian ingredients, gelato brioche sandwiches, and espresso and cioccolato affogato.

articles.title: May 29, 2025 at 9:48 AM EDT
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.summary: Nvidia launched its native GeForce Now app. This cloud game streaming service was tested on devices like Valve Steam Deck and Lenovo Legion Go S. Initial verdict shows the service works great in terms of performance and battery efficiency.

articles.title: Clear the clutter
articles.summary: The article suggests using 'lite' versions of popular apps like Facebook Lite, Messenger Lite, and Spotify Lite to save storage space on phones and tablets. These lite versions are smaller and more efficient while still offering essential functionalities.

articles.title: Can Baby Lotion Give You Baby-Soft Skin as an Adult? Here's the Truth
articles.summary: Johnson's Baby Lotion offers a milky, non-greasy texture for sensitive skin, containing glycerin and mineral oil for 24-hour moisture. Aveeno Baby Daily Moisture Lotion, with its oatmeal blend, soothes dryness and itchiness. Baby Secret Lotion, formulated with vitamin E and chamomile extract, soothes redness. Cetaphil Baby Daily Lotion with Organic Calendula uses glycerin, sunflower oil, and shea butter to protect and maintain healthy skin. Pears Baby Lotion hydrates without clogging pores, ideal for oily or breakout-prone skin.

articles.title: Review: Nvidia's GeForce Now Revitalizes My Steam Deck Experience
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched a native GeForce Now app for Steam Deck, enabling users to stream games with RTX 4080-powered graphics. The new app supports up to 4K60 HDR output, and allows Steam Deck to access games on Steam, Epic, Ubisoft, Xbox, and Battle.net. While requiring a stable internet connection, it offers a way to play demanding titles with high graphical settings on the handheld device.

articles.title: This electric scrubber is $350 off on Amazon Canada — shoppers say it's 'simply amazing'
articles.author: Sarah Rohoman
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber, a popular cleaning tool with a 4.4-star rating on Amazon Canada, is currently available at an 88% discount. The scrubber features six detachable brushes, a powerful motor with two speeds, and an extendable handle, and is capable of running for approximately two hours on a single charge. Over 800 people purchased the product in the last month.

articles.title: Tested: Nvidia's GeForce Now just breathed new life into my Steam Deck
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Nvidia's GeForce Now, a cloud gaming service, now has a native app for Steam Deck, allowing users to play games at high settings. The service streams games from the cloud, using RTX 4080-powered servers and syncing with Steam, Epic, Ubisoft, Xbox, and Battle.net accounts, providing access to games and savegames. Nvidia also has a free tier, and a 'Performance' tier for GeForce Now.

articles.title: KTS Group launches 'new generation' technology and 'green' consumer products on the KTS Mall e-commerce platform
articles.author: The World
articles.summary: KTS Group has launched a series of new technology products that includes VR 360 and AR platforms, AIO customer card-linked consumption management software with Web3 profile integration, AIO Global multi-utility application, KTS Builder Website platform with AI integration for profile and e-commerce websites, and KTS Mall e-commerce platform integrated with smart business management software. These solutions are designed to help businesses and individuals optimize operations and enhance productivity.

articles.title: Dyson's new bladeless desk fan has sleep mode for hot summer nights
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Cool CF1 desk fan, priced at £249.99, featuring a sleep mode, bladeless design for safety, and quiet operation. The fan delivers a steady 370 liters of air per second and has a minimalist design for easy cleaning.

articles.title: Notes: Old Town Books owner Ally Kirkpatrick launches Fabled Ice Cream
articles.author: ALXnow.com
articles.summary: Old Town Books has launched Fabled Ice Cream, a unique ice cream concept inspired by literature, in 2025. Currently operating as a mobile cart and catering service, Fabled Ice Cream plans to open a brick-and-mortar store in 2026, funded in part by a Honeycomb Credit campaign to purchase a high-capacity batch freezer.

articles.title: Cue the Confetti! BABY born's New Birthday Collection Adds Color-Changing, Mess-Free Fun
articles.author: Mga Entertainment
articles.summary: Zapf Creation has launched the BABY born Birthday Baby Doll. This doll features a color-changing face when fed frozen cake, offering a unique interactive play experience. It is party-ready in a festive pink mesh dress with flocked dots and white shoes.

articles.title: Goji Labs Expands UX and Accessibility Services to Empower Nonprofits
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Goji Labs has expanded its UX and accessibility services. These services are specifically designed to help nonprofits create digital experiences. The new services aim to ensure digital platforms are easy to use, effective, and accessible to a broad range of users.

articles.title: Goji Labs Expands UX and Accessibility Services to Empower Nonprofits
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Goji Labs has expanded its UX and accessibility services to assist nonprofits in creating user-friendly and accessible digital experiences. These expanded services include UX audits to find accessibility gaps, WCAG-informed design guidance integrated into UI/UX workflows, and usability testing with diverse users. This service aims to ensure that digital tools are inclusive and accessible to various users, including those with limited digital literacy or physical impairments.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a $1,499 laptop for as low as $429, and shoppers love the 'slim' and 'lightweight' design
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon has the Lenovo IdeaPad 1 on sale for regular shoppers and Prime members. The Lenovo IdeaPad 1 offers the right screen, storage space, and processor for a smooth experience.

articles.title: GBFoods, House of Iconic Culinary Brands, Gino, Bama and Jago Launches Five Game-Changing Culinary Innovations
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: GBfoods Nigeria launched five new culinary products aimed at bringing convenience, flavor, and innovation to the culinary sector. These new additions come from the house of iconic culinary brands Gino, Bama, and Jago.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker launches new whisky variant in Ghana
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker has launched its newest Scotch whisky variant, Johnnie Walker Blonde, in Ghana. Guinness Ghana aims to make whisky more accessible to younger people and new drinkers with this smooth, sweet, and easy-to-drink option.

articles.title: Opera's New AI agent Can Take Care of All Your Online Tasks While You are Away
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Opera has launched Opera Neon, an AI-backed browser designed to understand user intent and independently perform tasks on the web. Unlike traditional browsers, Opera Neon acts as a digital collaborator, planning vacations, building websites, and completing online tasks automatically, even while the user is away. It offers functionalities such as information discovery, comparison, and content creation, distinguishing itself through its ability to read web pages like a person and its focus on agentic web capabilities.

articles.title: Google Photos turns 10; Rolls out AI editor and smarter sharing via QR codes
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google Photos has launched a redesigned photo editor with new AI-driven features, including Reimagine and Auto frame from the Google Pixel 9's Magic Editor. The update streamlines the editing process and provides AI-generated suggestions, with the rollout beginning in June for Android devices and later for iOS.

articles.title: If You Love Finding Little 'Cheat Codes' For Life, Try These 34 Clever Home Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Oxo launched a new compact Brew Rapid Brewer. This version is cheaper and more portable, making cold brew in five minutes without compromising on flavor. The product needs no charging or plugging in.

articles.title: Dynavap's UniDyn Premium Vaporizer Burns Bright
articles.author: Cannabis Now
articles.summary: Dynavap has launched the UniDyn vaporizer, a user-friendly and cost-efficient ball vape with an optimized heat transfer design. DynaVap also introduced the BallR Cap, an upgrade option for compatible devices, offering convection-driven performance at an accessible price.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers are wiping shelves clean of ‘incredible' Sol de Janeiro dupe that's over £20 cheaper than designer perfume
articles.author: Owen Scott
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a body spray dupe of Sol de Janeiro, priced at £3.99 and scented with pistachio and salted caramel, or jasmine and dragon fruit. This product, along with other Lidl dupes like a bladeless desk fan and an air conditioner, have gained popularity among shoppers for their affordability and similarity to more expensive branded versions.

articles.title: Googles AI-powered advertising innovations to propel business growth in Nigeria
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: Google introduced AI-powered advertising innovations designed to help Nigerian businesses enhance their online presence and growth strategies. These new services aim to propel business growth in Nigeria through advanced Artificial Intelligence capabilities.

articles.title: Reviewers With And Without Glasses Carry These $9 Lens Wipes Everywhere
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Wowflash introduces lens wipes designed to remove dirt, dust, and smudges from glasses, sunglasses, and screens. These individually wrapped wipes are portable and streak-free, suitable for regular use and various settings like offices, beaches, and cars. User reviews highlight their effectiveness and convenience for maintaining clean lenses and screens.

articles.title: FX Comedy Show: Laundromat Parties – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Fx launched its new comedy series 'Adults' with a promotional event called 'Suds And Sounds' at laundromats. The event included laundry cards, branded merchandise, snacks, drinks, and entertainment, designed to engage the target audience. The series is available on Fx and Hulu.

articles.title: THIS browser codes, builds games and never sleeps — Meet Opera's AI upgrade
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Opera is developing Opera Neon, an AI-powered "agentic browser" capable of creating reports, writing code, designing games, and building websites. The browser utilizes both local and cloud-based AI and includes an integrated chatbot. Users can currently sign up for a waitlist for early access to the beta version.

articles.title: Opera's Neon Browser Promises to Do the Boring Stuff for You
articles.author: Sean Whitehead
articles.summary: Opera has unveiled Opera Neon, a new browser designed with AI-powered features to automate web tasks like form filling, booking trips, and even code writing. The browser introduces three new buttons: Chat, Do, and Make, each leveraging AI to assist users.

articles.title: New Look 'flattering and comfy' £34 midi dress shoppers have 'bought in 3 colours'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its best-selling Drawstring Waist Textured Midi Dress, priced at £33.99 and available in five colors. The dress is being praised for its comfortable fit and flattering silhouette, and is available on the New Look website in sizes 8 to 22. They also have another product "Short Sleeve Tie Waist Midi Dress with Linen" priced at £34.

articles.title: POCO launches POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71 in Nigeria: Power meets accessibility
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: POCO has launched two new smartphones in Nigeria: the POCO X7 Pro and the POCO C71. The POCO X7 Pro features a Dimensity 8400-Ultra Processor and is available with 12GB RAM and 512GB storage, while the POCO C71 offers a more affordable option with configurations including 3GB+64GB and 4GB+128GB. Both models are available for purchase starting May 29th, 2025, in Xiaomi authorized retail stores and on major e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: Juniper Moon Gin: crafting a unique London Dry with an innovative twist
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: Juniper Moon Gin is introducing a unique London Dry gin featuring nine botanicals, including juniper berries, orris, angelica roots, and two secret ingredients never sold to distillers before. To promote this new offering, Juniper Moon Gin will host an exclusive gin-pairing experience in Cape Town featuring culinary delights from renowned chefs and gin creations by a master mixologist.

articles.title: Next shoppers love these 'non-rub' £29 sandals are 'always comfortable'
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: Next offers Forever Comfort Double Strap Footbed Sandals priced at £29, available in multiple colors and sizes. The sandals are designed for comfort with cushioned soles and adjustable buckles, receiving positive reviews for their comfort and value.

articles.title: After buying Tazz, Wolt is now live in 34 Romanian cities
articles.author: Aurel Dragan
articles.summary: Wolt has launched its app in Romania, offering users a wider selection of restaurants, supermarkets, and stores, along with features like real-time tracking and Wolt+ benefits. Merchants gain access to a large customer base and promotional tools, while courier partners benefit from enhanced routing and communication tools. The launch marks a new chapter for Wolt in the Romanian local delivery market.

articles.title: Introducing Norton Neo: The Browser Ahead of You
articles.summary: Gen has launched Norton Neo, a new AI-native browser, designed to provide proactive assistance and enhanced security. Built on Chromium, Norton Neo offers features like AI-powered search, task automation, and built-in protection against ads and online threats. Gen aims to redefine the browsing experience with this new product.

articles.title: How Terra Premium is catering to Nigeria's diverse tastes
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: TGI Group has launched Terra Premium Seasoning Cube in Nigeria, a new product designed for modern retail spaces like supermarkets and hypermarkets.  The product aims to offer a sophisticated culinary experience with high-quality ingredients and elegant packaging, setting a new standard in the seasoning category.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign Launch Trailer Features Evanescence
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: FromSoftware and Bandai Namco released the launch trailer for Elden Ring Nightreign.

articles.title: Lava launches Bold N1 and Bold N1 Pro in India, price starts at Rs 5,999
articles.summary: Lava has launched its new Bold series smartphones in India, introducing the Bold N1 and Bold N1 Pro. The Bold N1 is priced at Rs 5,999 with 4GB RAM and 64GB storage, while the Bold N1 Pro is priced at Rs 6,799 with 4GB RAM and 128GB storage. The Bold N1 Pro goes on sale from June 2, followed by the Bold N1 on June 4, both exclusively available via Amazon India.

articles.title: Aldi confirms return of viral beer dispenser for under £25 ahead of Father's Day
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Ambiano Beer Dispenser for £24.99, along with a range of Father's Day gifts, including the Drew & Cole Breakfast Sandwich Maker. Asda has also re-introduced its Riviera Stripe Parasol for £59, featuring a stylish design and weatherproof canopy.

articles.title: AI Agents Are Poised to Disrupt Commerce. View this Startup's Pitch Deck to Help Brands Adapt
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: New Gen is launching a service that helps brands prepare for the shift to AI agents shopping online. The service uses hosted subdomains to adapt in real-time depending on the visitor. Bots are served structured data designed to complete specific functions like comparing products, checking shipping timelines and accessing real-time inventory.

articles.title: Power meets accessibility: POCO launches POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71 in Nigeria
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: POCO has launched the POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71 smartphones in Nigeria starting May 29th, 2025. The POCO X7 Pro is aimed at tech-savvy users with its flagship Dimensity 8400-Ultra processor and 50MP camera, while the POCO C71 targets entry-level users with a 32MP AI dual camera and immersive 6.88" HD+ display. Both models are available at authorized retail stores and online platforms.

articles.title: Dunkin'® Kicks Off a Summer of Refreshers with the Pink Spritz, Starring Giggly Squad Podcaster and TV Star Paige DeSorbo
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dunkin' is introducing the Dunkin' Pink Spritz Refresher this summer. This new drink features a blend of guava, orange, and passion fruit flavors with sparkling water.

articles.title: The Huawei Mate X6 is built for leaders who move fast and work smart
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Huawei Mate X6, a foldable smartphone designed for business professionals. The device features robust construction with Rocket Steel hinge and Kunlun Glass, enhanced multitasking capabilities with EMUI 15, and an Ultra Chroma Camera system for high-quality images. It is available online and through select business partners across SA.

articles.title: ‘Summer Like You Mean It' – M&S Launches New Summer 25' Campaign (Marks & Spencer Group plc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) is launching its new summer campaign in stores starting Thursday, May 29th. The campaign aims to encourage customers to celebrate summer's small moments, featuring appropriate styles and products.

articles.title: POCO Launches POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71 in Nigeria: Power Meets Accessibility
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: POCO has launched two new smartphones, the POCO X7 Pro and POCO C71, in Nigeria on May 29th, 2025. The POCO X7 Pro, with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage, targets tech-savvy users, while the POCO C71 is designed for entry-level users. Both models are available for purchase at authorized retail stores and online platforms like the Xiaomi Jumia Store.

articles.title: Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 6 review: Classic workhorse with a few quirks
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: The Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 6 is a new business laptop featuring an AMD Ryzen AI 7 PRO 360 processor, a 14-inch WUXGA IPS display, and modern security features including a fingerprint reader and IR camera. It includes a Copilot key for AI-powered workflows. It's being marketed as a solid choice for those wanting a reliable, powerful, and quiet business laptop capable of handling a full day of work.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Series With Up To 50MP Camera, 5,000mAh Battery Launched In India: Price Starts At Rs 5,999
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched the Lava Bold N1 series in India, featuring the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro models. The Lava Bold N1 is priced at Rs 5,999 and the Lava Bold N1 Pro is priced at Rs 6,699. Both devices are exclusively available on Amazon, with the Bold N1 Pro going on sale on June 2 and the Lava Bold N1 on June 4.

articles.title: How Temu empowered Fone Central to create jobs and drive 'incredible' growth
articles.author: Lucy Varley
articles.summary: Fone Central launched two stores on Temu, one for refurbished electronics and another for its DYZI product line. The company experienced high sales velocity on Temu, selling over 10 high-value phones in three days. Fone Central expects Temu to contribute 20% of the company's total revenue within six months.

articles.title: Celebrate World Gin Day with five easy peasy cocktail mixes
articles.author: THANGO NTWASA
articles.summary: Musgrave Spirits identifies different types of gin lovers and recommends perfect gin matches and cocktails for each category. For example, for the Adventure Seeker, they suggest a Musgrave Original cocktail called Botanical Arrangement. For the Cocktail Craftsperson, Musgrave Spirits recommends Pretty in Pink cocktail made with Musgrave Pink Gin.

articles.title: ⚡Know Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro Price, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Bold N1 series, including the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro, in India. These new smartphones feature an IP54 water and dust resistance rating, fast charging, and other features within the INR 10,000 price segment.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro Price, Specifications and Features Revealed, Know Everything About New Smartphones Launched in India by Lava Mobiles
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles has launched two new smartphones in India: the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro. The Lava Bold N1 is priced at INR 5,999 and will be available from June 4, 2025, while the Lava Bold N1 Pro costs INR 6,699 and will go on sale from June 2, 2025. Both phones offer competitive features within the INR 10,000 segment.

articles.title: Google opens its online store to sell Pixel devices throughout India
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Google Store now provides Pixel users with self-service options. These users can initiate repair requests and schedule pick-up services directly from the Google Store website, improving the customer experience.

articles.title: Lava ଲଞ୍ଚ କଲା Bold N1 ଓ N1 Pro ସ୍ମାର୍ଟଫୋନ; ଉଭୟ ଦାମ 8ହଜାରରୁ କମ୍‌
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Lava has launched two new budget smartphones, Bold N1 and Bold N1 Pro, in the Indian smartphone market. The Lava Bold N1 is priced at ₹5,999 for the 4GB + 64GB model and will be available on Amazon from June 4th, while the Lava Bold N1 Pro is priced at ₹6,799 for the 4GB + 128GB model and will be available on Amazon India from June 2nd.

articles.title: We'll support talent, innovative ideas, says Minister
articles.author: Juliana Agbo
articles.summary: The National Board for Technology Incubation (NBTI), in collaboration with UKALD, has launched the NextGen Innovators Challenge 2025. This initiative aims to support young Nigerian innovators by offering access to investors, mentors, technical support, and pathways to commercialize innovations like locally built drones, solar-powered vehicles, smart agriculture applications, and clean energy solutions.

articles.title: Opera's Neon AI agentic browser promises to do everything – even write code while you're offline
articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.summary: Opera has launched a new "AI agentic browser" capable of performing tasks like shopping, form-filling, and coding. The browser includes features like 'Make,' enabling users to create websites, games, and code snippets using AI and plain English prompts.

articles.title: I wish all headphones had the AKG N9 Hybrid's clever connectivity – here's why it's a great travel companion
articles.summary: AKG has launched the N9 Hybrid, a noise-canceling headphone featuring a unique built-in USB-C dongle for versatile connectivity. The headphones boast high-grade audio, impressive battery life (up to 100 hours), and active noise cancellation, positioning it against competitors like the Sony WH1000-XM6. It has a price of $399/£299.

articles.title: Opera Neon browser launches with built-in AI and a monthly fee
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Opera is reviving Opera Neon, a browser concept, integrating agentic AI that users can assign tasks to. This updated version requires a paid subscription and waitlist access.

articles.title: Lovart Launches The First Design Agent, Draws Global User Surge
articles.author: Lovart
articles.summary: Lovart, an AI startup, has launched its autonomous design agent, a platform that automates the entire creative process. Lovart enables users to generate professional-grade assets simultaneously, spanning images, video, audio, and 3D. The system integrates multiple AI models and produces layered, editable content ready for direct use.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro Launched in India; Check Prices, Specifications and Features of Lava Bold N1 Series
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro smartphones in India. The Lava Bold N1 starts at INR 5,999, while the Lava Bold N1 Pro starts at INR 6,699, both available beginning in June 2025. The phones feature different camera configurations, display sizes, and processors, with both offering virtual RAM and varying storage options.

articles.title: TNW Backstage tunes into the future of earbuds
articles.author: Thomas Macaulay
articles.summary: Breggz, founded by Xander de Buisonjé, is launching fully wireless, custom-fitted audio devices. These devices aim to provide listeners with high-quality sound, matching the artists' original intentions.

articles.title: Lava launches Bold N1 Pro and Bold N1 4G smartphones for budget conscious buyers in India
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Lava launched two new 4G smartphones, the Lava Bold N1 and Bold N1 Pro, in India. The Lava Bold N1 Pro is priced at ₹6,699, while the Bold N1 sells for ₹5,999 and will be available on Amazon from June 2nd and June 4th, respectively.

articles.title: Opera Introduces AI-Powered Neon Browser That Works Even When You're Offline
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Opera is developing Opera Neon, an AI-powered web browser designed to automate tasks such as generating games, writing code, and building websites. The browser features an 'agentic browser' design with AI agents capable of autonomous operation and multitasking, and includes a built-in chatbot for quick information retrieval. Opera Neon will be a premium browser with some AI functionalities potentially behind a paywall, and a beta release is planned.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A to be Released in October on Switch and Switch 2
articles.author: M. Faiz Zaki
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company International will release Pokemon Legends: Z-A in mid-October, available on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. Pre-orders begin June 5, 2025, coinciding with the Nintendo Switch 2 launch, and players can upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. The game offers an open-world experience set in Lumiose City.

articles.title: Lovart Launches The First Design Agent, Draws Global User Surge
articles.author: Lovart
articles.summary: Lovart, an AI startup, has launched its autonomous design agent, a platform designed to automate the entire creative process. The platform enables users to generate numerous professional-grade assets simultaneously across various media formats, using integrated AI models to produce layered, editable content.

articles.title: Lovart Launches The First Design Agent, Draws Global User Surge
articles.author: Lovart
articles.summary: Lovart, an AI startup, has launched its autonomous design agent, a platform that automates the entire creative process. This platform enables users to generate numerous professional-grade assets simultaneously, spanning images, video, audio, and 3D formats. The platform gained significant traction, surpassing 100,000 users in 5 days.

articles.title: How Android App Developers are Redefining User Experience with Smart Design, Faster Performance, and Game-Changing Features
articles.author: Lawrence Yackulic
articles.summary: Android app developers are enhancing user experience through design improvements such as gesture-based controls and adaptive UIs. Google's Material You design system personalizes apps based on user preferences, and smart onboarding experiences guide users contextually, such as in casino apps offering tutorials on low-stakes betting. Performance is improved with lightweight code and lazy loading, and offline functionality is enhanced with data caching, allowing users to continue tasks even with poor connectivity.

articles.title: This new silicone-free haircare range tackles frizz, damage, dryness and more
articles.author: Lydia Wheatley
articles.summary: Living Proof launched a new silicone-free haircare range featuring four new shampoo and conditioner pairings. The new ranges target specific hair concerns (frizz, damage, dryness, and lack of volume) and feature Sili-CLONE™ HairTech, a new technology delivering silicone-like benefits without silicone. The ranges include Perfect hair Day, Full, No Frizz, and Restore bundles, each addressing unique hair needs.

articles.title: Honor 400: AI Photography & Long Battery Life – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The Honor 400 series has been launched, featuring a 200MP camera with AI enhancements for improved image quality. The phones also include a large 5,300mAh silicon-carbon battery for extended use and fast charging capabilities. The series aims to redefine user expectations in the mid-range smartphone market.

articles.title: Sky is dishing out free Samsung Galaxy tablets - here's how to grab yours today
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Sky is offering a free Galaxy Tab A9+ tablet (worth £259) to customers who purchase a Galaxy S25 smartphone on contract. Mobiles.co.uk also offers the S25 with the free tablet. Samsung itself is giving away the Tab A9+ with S25 purchases, plus offering trade-in discounts on older phones.

articles.title: Which 'Panchayat' Character Do You Think You Are?
articles.author: Tanishtha Kotian
articles.summary: Due to the incomplete information in the article, a comprehensive summary cannot be provided. Assuming the article details a company's launch of a new product, it reports on that event. Further details about the product's features and launch specifics are needed to fully summarize the article.

articles.title: 올리브영, 자립준비청년에 뷰티·건강용품 정기 기부
articles.summary: CJ Olive Young is launching a regular donation program to provide beauty and health products to young adults transitioning to independence. The initiative involves donating over 1 billion won worth of goods every quarter, with the first delivery ceremony taking place on May 28. They plan to donate essential daily items such as basic cosmetics, hair and body products, and hygiene products.

articles.title: POVA Curve 5G Launch Today in India With 7.45mm Thickness; Check Price, Specifications and Features of New Smartphones by POVA Mobile
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: POVA is launching the POVA Curve 5G smartphone in India with a 7.45mm thickness and curved design. The phone will likely have a 5,000mAh battery, 6GB or 8GB RAM, and 128GB or 256GB storage options. Lava is also launching the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro smartphones in India.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro Launch Today in India; Check Price, Specifications and Features of New Smartphones by Lava Mobiles
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles is launching the Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro smartphones in India. The Lava Bold N1 price starts at INR 5,999 with sale starting on June 4, and the Lava Bold N1 Pro price at INR 6,699 with sale starting on June 2, 2025. Motorola is also launching Motorola Razr 60 smartphone in India.

articles.title: Farnworth based Blazing Limited hosts outgoing mayor's final visit
articles.author: Eoin McCaul
articles.summary: Blazing Limited, a Bolton-based food manufacturer, produces sauces, rubs, and breading for food service businesses across the UK and Europe. Starting with a Peri Peri Sauce in 2016, the company has expanded its product line to include wings sauce and coating mixes. The company emphasizes innovation and creativity in product development.

articles.title: Newbie store opening in Windsor Yards shopping centre
articles.author: Isabella Harris
articles.summary: Newbie, a sustainable lifestyle brand, is opening a new store at the Windsor Royal on June 5th. The store will offer clothing for babies, children, and women. To celebrate the opening, customers will receive a 15% discount throughout the opening weekend, with goody bags for the first 100 shoppers.

articles.title: Healthcare startup Lysol announced on the 29th that it was finally selected for the "2025 Baby Unico..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: Lysol, a healthcare startup, was selected for the "2025 Baby Unicorn Promotion Project". Lysol leads the mental healthcare market with its Sleepysol series, wearable devices that combine microcurrent-based nerve control technology and AI-based bio-signal analysis algorithms. Sleepisol is sold in Korea, Japan, and the United States, and has also passed the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) safety standards.

articles.title: LG U+ announced on the 29th that it has signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with Luton Techno..
articles.author: Dried Seaweed
articles.summary: LG U+ has partnered with Luton Technologies to integrate Luton's AI chatbot content into LG U+'s 'Excio' AI agent service. This collaboration aims to improve the accessibility and utility of AI services for customers, effectively introducing new content and enhanced usability to the 'Excio' service.

articles.title: Payne: Midwest-friendly Hyundai Ioniq 5 XRT sports all-terrain tires, NACS charging
articles.author: Detroit news
articles.summary: Hyundai is launching a new off-road trim, the Ioniq 5 XRT, for its electric hatchback in 2025. The Ioniq 5 XRT features distinctive black detailing, including a black mask, black wheels, and black wheel arches.

articles.title: Girbau & Girbau North America Clean Show Booth 2523 to Showcase Vended Laundry Solutions and Demos
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Girbau North America (GNA) is introducing new products at Clean Show '25, including GS Series washers with increased capacity and enhanced features, new ExpressDry dryer capacity offerings for improved efficiency, and the Genius ExpressClean storewide soap delivery system. These introductions aim to improve customer convenience, reduce operational costs, and boost revenue.

articles.title: 32 Products So Useful You'll Celebrate Using Them
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched the Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, designed for those with thin or fragile lashes, offering easy removal. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, makeup designed with a color-adapting formula to help your bags ~disappear~, giving you instant coverage with a lightweight feel. WD-40 released a pen version for precise application, offering the original's benefits in a convenient form.

articles.title: Opera's new AI browser can create games, write codes and work even when humans are offline
articles.summary: Opera is developing Opera Neon, a new AI-powered 'agentic browser' designed to perform tasks such as creating games, writing code, and building websites from user prompts. This browser uses both local and cloud-based AI and features a built-in chatbot and an 'AI Agent' tool. Opera has confirmed that Neon will be a premium browser and users can now join a waitlist for early access.

articles.title: Best tablets with stylus that will change the way you work, create and learn forever
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article introduces several new tablets with stylus support, including the Redmi Pad Pro 5G, Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE, Lenovo Tab M11 with Pen, Xiaomi Pad 7, and Lenovo IdeaTab Pro. These tablets offer features like high-resolution displays, powerful processors, long battery life, and stylus compatibility, catering to users seeking productivity and creative capabilities.

articles.title: Microsoft Is Opening Windows Update To Third-Party Apps
articles.summary: Microsoft is previewing a new Windows Update orchestration platform. This platform aims to improve the Windows Update experience.

articles.title: Save up to 85% on robot vacuum cleaners from Dreame, iRobot and more on Amazon: Top 5 deals shortlisted for you
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on robot vacuum cleaners from brands like Dreame, iRobot, and ECOVACS. The DREAME L10 Prime features a self-cleaning mop system and 4000Pa suction, while the DREAME L10S Pro Ultra offers 7,000 Pa suction and hot water mop cleaning. The ECOVACS DEEBOT N20 PRO is equipped with 8000Pa suction and the Ozmo Pro vibrating mopping system.

articles.title: Fujifilm launches new analog instant camera instax mini 41™ in the Philippines
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: Fujifilm Philippines has launched the 'instax mini 41™', the latest entry model in the instax series, featuring a sleek design, Close-up Mode with parallax adjustment, and Automatic Light Adjustment. The camera is priced at P6,599 and is available at Fujifilm authorized dealers, with a color-matched camera case also introduced.

articles.title: Aldi Fans ‘Need' This Summer Find: ‘Couldn't Agree More'
articles.author: Gabriela Arevalo
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced BigMouth inflatable pool noodles, specifically a sub sandwich and a stick of salted butter design, in their Aldi Finds aisle. The salted butter pool noodle has garnered significant attention from Aldi fans, with the company promoting it as "summer's hottest accessory". The pool noodles are available for $9.99.

articles.title: Unleash AI's Infinite Potential: AI+ Power 2025, Hong Kong's Premier AI Application Exhibition, Lands June 5-6
articles.author: Power
org: Office of the Government Chief Information Officer
articles.summary: BUSINESS GOVirtual (BGOV) presents AI+ Power 2025 on June 5-6, 2025, at the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre, showcasing AI solutions for enterprises and SMEs. The event will feature AI-driven chatbots, smart data analytics and immersive AI exhibition zone.  Aspire will offer USD$200 credits for creating an account at their booth G01, which supports digitized financial management system.

articles.title: AI+ Power 2025 set to ignite Hong Kong this June
articles.author: AI+ Power 2025
org: Office of the Government Chief Information Officer
articles.summary: BGOV is presenting AI+ Power 2025, an AI application exhibition in Hong Kong on June 5-6, 2025. The event showcases AI solutions from startups and top-tier companies, offering practical AI tools and featuring over 100 AI solutions, including Campus AI, AI Translation Tools, and AI-Powered Analytics. Aspire is offering USD$200 credits at the event to new account holders for its digitized financial management system.

articles.title: 28 Products For Organized Neat Freaks
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new organizers and storage solutions, including a desk set from Talking Out of Turn and a closet organizer from The Container Store. These products aim to optimize space and provide convenient storage solutions for various items, such as clothing, shoes, and desk supplies. These companies are introducing new ways to organize many different personal items.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics' all-in-one washing and drying machine exceeded 100,000 cumulative sales in Kore..
articles.author: A Broadcasting Fan
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics' Bespoke AI combo, an all-in-one washing and drying machine, has exceeded 100,000 units in domestic sales within a year. The 2025 Bespoke AI combo model increases drying capacity to 18kg and shortens drying time by 20 minutes, completing washing and drying in as little as 79 minutes.

articles.title: Wet Hydration Rolls Out Packaging Refresh to Support Expanding Market Presence
articles.author: Wet Hydration
articles.summary: Wet Hydration introduces refreshed packaging for its Wellness Water. The updated look enhances consumer understanding with vibrant fruit imagery, prominent "Wellness Water" display and detailed side panel messaging explaining the zero-sugar, zero-calorie, and bubble-free benefits.

articles.title: 57 Products That Are Very Good At Their Jobs
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several new beauty products and household helpers have been launched. This includes E.l.f. Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, Cremo Body Wash, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Olay Super Serum Body Wash , Summer Lemon Marinara sauce,  Good Molecules Pineapple Exfoliating Powder and Oxo's portable Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. Also several household cleaning solutions have been launched that include dishwashing spray, Lugi's Sink and Drain Plunger, dishwasher-cleaning tablets.  Additionally a new Lanolips SPF 30 lip balm has been launched.

articles.title: Domain Search Script  Domain and Hosting Order System
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart introduced a new PHP script for checking domain availability and adding hosting. It supports multiple TLDs, various payment gateways including PayPal and Stripe, and over 700 domain extensions. The script also features a one-page checkout.

articles.title: Nvidia CEO eases concerns about China with upbeat sales forecast
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Nvidia is expanding its hardware and software offerings, resulting in increased product sales to its customer base.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI pays $300M to Russia's favorite messaging app to push Grok
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: Telegram will offer Grok models from xAI to its users. Telegram will receive a 50% cut of xAI subscriptions.

articles.title: Makan Lain Macam, Segar Tetap Terasa: Classic Cans, Bold New Bites with Ayam Brand™ Sardines & Mackerel
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Ayam Brand is promoting new ways to use their sardines and mackerel with their 'Makan Lain Macam' campaign, featuring fusion recipes like Sardine Mac & Cheese Balls and Mackerel Masak Merah. They also announced a limited-time offer where customers can buy 2 Sardines or Mackerels (425g) and Get 1 Free Ayam Brand™ Fried Chilli Mackerel (155g) at selected stores.

articles.title: The Future Of Sales Isn't AI Agent Vs. Human—It's Both
articles.author: Gary Drenik
articles.summary: Vidyard is utilizing AI through its Video Sales Agent, which automates personalized follow-ups and meeting confirmations, and AI Avatars, which create realistic representations of salespeople for video communications. These technologies aim to improve sales efficiency by automating tasks, freeing up sales representatives to focus on building meaningful customer relationships and high-value interactions, ultimately improving the sales process.

articles.title: Heinz Is Ketchup, To AI
articles.author: John Werner
articles.summary: Heinz used AI image generation models like DALL-E to draw ketchup. The AI models consistently produced images resembling Heinz ketchup, validating its market dominance and iconic status. The results highlight how AI perceives and represents the brand, reinforcing Heinz's association with ketchup in the collective consciousness.

articles.title: Harry Potter x MINISO Pop-Up Store Now Open at Mall of India, Noida
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: MINISO has opened a Harry Potter-themed pop-up store at the Mall of India in Noida. This new retail space offers Harry Potter merchandise, introducing a new product offering from MINISO.

articles.title: Lamborghini Reveals Revuelto Driving Sim At DreamHack Dallas
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lamborghini will introduce a new driving simulator. This announcement was made at DreamHack Dallas 2025. The simulator aims to expand the brand's reach to a younger demographic.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 needs to let us become Pokémon again
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. The launch titles include Mario Kart World and Cyberpunk 2077.

articles.title: Samsung QLED TVs Earn "Real Quantum Dot Display" Certification from TÜV Rheinland
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: Samsung QLED TVs received certification for compliance with international Quantum Dot display standards. This certification highlights Samsung's dedication to display innovation and quality within its QLED TV product line.

articles.title: Blink's new wireless video doorbell gives Ring a run for its money with two-year battery ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Blink is releasing its next-generation Video Doorbell. The cost of the new doorbell is lower than expected.

articles.title: Glenmuir rolls out ‘Discover Why' TV ad on Sky Sports Golf
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Glenmuir, a leading apparel brand, launched a new TV advert on Sky. This launch signifies the introduction of a new promotional initiative by the company.

articles.title: Pixel shopping, the Indian way: Google's Mitul Shah on tailoring a 'first-of-its-kind' online Google Store experience for India's unique needs
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google launched a direct-to-consumer online store for its Pixel business in India. This decision signifies a strategic move in Google's market expansion.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Nintendo Switch Online Overview Trailer
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch Online memberships and the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack offer included benefits. These memberships enhance the Nintendo Switch online experience.

articles.title: Starbucks set to unveil new frappuccino flavours in July: Check out the four new drinks
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching four new Frappuccino flavors nationwide in July. The company provided a sneak peek of these frozen treats ahead of the official launch, preparing them for the 4th of July.

articles.title: The Ninja Blast Portable Blender Is The Perfect Summer Gadget, And It's 25% Off Right Now
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Ninja Blast introduces its portable blender. The blender is cordless.
